activity_differential: person recording their movement in living room
person exploring room while holding camera
description: A person, visible by their sneakers and trousers, is moving around a living room, at times sitting and at times walking. The camera, likely held by the person, pans and tilts to follow their movement and the environment. Various mats, doormats, tiles, and other inanimate objects are present but not manipulated. The person is briefly seen in a mirror, confirming their animate status and camera control.

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: Trousers are clothing worn on a person and cannot be spatially located to the 'left of' a floor tile as an independent entity; the relationship is physically implausible.
relationship_filter_metadata.label: physically_impossible

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: The relationship 'trousers on top of trousers' is redundant since both objects are essentially the same clothing item; stating one is on top of the other adds no meaningful spatial information.
relationship_filter_metadata.label: redundant

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: A mat cannot wear anything, so the relationship 'mat wearing ...' is physically impossible.
